message: I think we should both get more than last time. Let's go for a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a fair deal, considering the money loses value with each passing round.
Considering the inflation, let's meet in the middle.
Inflation is hitting us both hard. I'm willing to go down to 5500, but I think this is the best we can do to make sure we both get a decent share before the money is worth even less.
